name: Backup File
summary: Learn about .BAK2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: There are several different uses of the "bak2" file extension. It may be created to represent the number of backup versions for a file. The "bak2" extension would represent the second backup version of the file. Other programs, such as Crysis, use the "bak2" extension to backup a BAK file that backs up .CRY map level files. If your CRY file is corrupt, you can replace it by renaming the "bak2" extension of your file to "cry."

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
